problem.markdown: 4. Which of the following are TRUE about a dynamic latch? (a) It stores charge on parasitic capacitor. (b) It's output state is robust. (c) It operates through feedback. (d) It is faster and smaller. ( ) (a) and (b) ( ) (b) and (c) ( ) (c) and (d) (x) (d) and (a)
problem.p: 4. Which of the following are TRUE about a dynamic latch? (a) It stores charge on parasitic capacitor. (b) It's output state is robust. (c) It operates through feedback. (d) It is faster and smaller.
